title: On The Mound For The Yankees: $155 Million Well Spent
teaser: Baseball's most notable offseason signing is currently the best pitcher in the league. Masahiro Tanaka, signed by the New York Yankees for $155 million, is dominating the sport. Jonah Keri of Grantland.com talks to Robert Siegel about Tanaka's amazing start.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
